snippet: Not even Nate Silver could have forecast such disparate developments on opposite coasts over the season’s first week and a half.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column compares New York Knicks to their cross country rivals Los Angeles Lakers; says only thing team's have in common this season is both have rosters of league's elder statesmen.
lead_paragraph: Not even Nate Silver could have forecast such disparate developments on opposite coasts over the season’s first week and a half.

headline.seo: Knicks and Lakers: Contrast for the Ages
headline.main: Knicks and Lakers: Contrasts on Coasts
headline.print_headline: Knicks and Lakers: Contrasts on Coasts
